newsArray.title: Newcastle će ponovo biti aktivan na tržištu, želja im je da dovedu igrača Nottingham Foresta
creator: Dželil Duranović
newsArray.description: Newcastle United ponovo je pokazao interes za zvijezdu Nottingham Foresta, Morgana Gibbs-Whitea, pred nadolazeći ljetni prijelazni rok, izvori su rekli Football Insideru. Newcastle je spreman pridružiti se Tottenhamu u utrci za potpis 24-godišnjaka – s Football Insiderom koji je otkrio 26. marta da Spursi drže prvu poziciju za njegovo dovođenje. Gibbs-White je bio meta Newcastlea […] The post Newcastle će ponovo biti aktivan na tržištu, želja im je da dovedu igrača Nottingham Foresta appeared first on SPORT CENTAR.

newsArray.title: Jurgen Klopp sends Liverpool players same famous Barcelona message for Atalanta mission
creator: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (David Anderson)
newsArray.description: Liverpool came from three goals down against Barcelona in their Champions League semi-final in 2019 in arguably Anfield's biggest European night and Jurgen Klopp now wants his side to repeat the feat in Atalanta

newsArray.title: L'ouverture du score de Rodrygo pour le Real Madrid contre Manchester City en vidéo
creator: Bruno Rodrigues
newsArray.description: Après le match nul à l'aller en Espagne (3-3), le Real Madrid a ouvert le score sur la pelouse de Manchester City, ce mercredi soir en quarts de finale retour de la Ligue des champions, grâce à un but de Rodrygo.

newsArray.title: NCAA fast tracks rule change to make multi-time transfers immediately eligible, matching court order
creator: RALPH D. RUSSO, Associated Press
newsArray.description: NCAA athletes will be immediately eligible to play no matter how many times they transfer — as long as they meet academic requirements — after the association fast-tracked legislation Wednesday to fall in line with a recent court order. The NCAA posted on social media that the Division I Council's decision becomes official Thursday when [...]
